title: Start
body:
Elder: Hi, I'm so glad you could make it!
Elder: Please, feel at home and take a seat.
Elder: So I have this gadget that my relative gave me.
Elder: And it would be really great if you could assist.

[[Take a look |TakeALook]]
[[No thanks |NoThanks]]

title: TakeALook
body:
<<start_activity>>  
Elder: Here, take a look for yourself.

title: NoThanks
body:
...
The Elder stares, unaccepting to your response.

[[Respond |ElderAwait]]
[[No thanks |NoThanks]]

title: ElderAwait
body:
Elder: It would be really great if you could assist.
...

[[Take a look |TakeALook]]
[[No thanks |NoThanks]]

title: Press_S_to_Start
body: Elder: Press "S" to start the activity.
